album.name: Simes and Steff Visit
album.description: Simes and Steff came to visit us for the day, and as Simes couldn't remember ever being to Brighton before we thought we'd go for a wander to the pier.

image.caption: The empty log flume on Brighton Pier
image.description: We watched this for quite a while, and only saw 2 people get onto it.

image.caption: Stuffy shows off her bump
image.description: This photo was taken especially for Steff's friend Amanda in the US who has been nagging Steff to get a photo taken to show how big her bump is getting. :-)

image.caption: Stray dodgem cars
image.description: Not sure whether these were hiding out of the way, or had been misbehaving!

image.caption: Rich, Simes and Steff on the pier
image.description: This wasn't staged, although it looks like it. Think they were looking out at the West Pier.

image.caption: Sunset Reflection
image.description: Whilst taking one of the pier shots, I noticed the sun reflecting on the side of the Waltzers.
